title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset and trying to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
OB: The group dialog is not shown when attempting to define a group for a table report item without a dataset set.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not defined. Users should be able to define a group for a table report item regardless of the dataset.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Create a new report.
3. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
4. Try to create a new table group.
5. Verify that the group dialog is not displayed.
